answers.answer: Cannot comment about pain in groin, but men with diabetes and high blood pressure are said to have ED and ad on TV says Levitra helps. A ring around penis might help get hard, otherwise frequent masterbation will allow one to ejaculate as often as you want. There are also some pumps which will stimulate blood into penis. Tingling feeling in feet is leg neuropathy.

question: I have some problems from my diabetes which is a pain in my groin area between the anus and the scrotum i believe this is from my diabetes.   my pain is lessened from the use of neurotin.    now i do have erectile dysfunction so wondering how I can have my sexual life back if possible?    it is hard for my to get my penus hard maybe once per month i can but only for a few seconds.   now i do have tingling feeling in my feet so also wondering what i can do isn this area as well .   any help is appreciated thanks
title: Type can effect erectile dysfunction?
